title: 3 cops' trial in Floyd killing heads to closing arguments - Associated Press
content:
1. 3 cops' trial in Floyd killing heads to closing arguments  Associated Press
  2. Thomas Lane takes stand as defense wraps case in MPD federal trial | FOX 9 KMSP  FOX 9 Minneapolis-St. Paul
  3. Three former officers have testified about what they saw when George Floyd died. Here's what they said  CNN
  4. In closing arguments, prosecutor says officers stood by as Chauvin slowly killed George Floyd 'in broad daylight on a public street'  Minneapolis Star Tribune
  5. 3 police officers in George Floyd killing 'chose to do nothing,' prosecutor says  NBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: ST. PAUL, Minn. (AP) — A defense attorney at the federal trial of three Minneapolis police officers charged with violating George Floyd’s civil rights   said during closing arguments Tuesday that Floyd's death was a tragedy, but that doesn't make it a crime.
